Package energy.usef.brp.workflow.settlement.send

This package contains the java components and logic needed to send Settlement messages.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrpSendSettlementMessagesCoordinator
    This coordinator class is in charge of the workflow sending Settlement messages to aggregators.
    BrpSettlementMessageDispositionTimer
    Class which will register a scheduled task whose purpose is to check whether some settlement messages have not received a response in time and hence should be marked as DISPUTED.
    BrpSettlementMessageResponseCoordinator
    Brp Coordinator in charge of the workflow related to the reception of a SettlementMessageResponse message.
    CheckInitiateSettlementDoneEvent
    Event class which can be used to trigger the sending of Settlement messages.
    SendSettlementMessageEvent
    Event class which can be used to trigger the sending of Settlement messages.

Package energy.usef.brp.workflow.settlement.send Description

This package contains the java components and logic needed to send Settlement messages.
